resources.string: simple card game you will try to guess if the next card will be higher or lower. Everytime you guess right by clicking on the UPP or DOWN arrows, you will willmake a point.

In this simple card game you will try to guess if the next card will be higher or lower. Everytime you guess right by clicking on the UP or DOWN arrows you will will make a point. The cards value according to the sequences below, from higher to lower, first according to Ranks and second according Suits, or in case thereâ€™s a tie in rank. The highest rank being the Ace. GOOD LUCK!:)
